description.en: JUST NETWORK is the next generation fully-scalable and decentralized social network platform.  It uses cutting-edge blockchain technology to establish a new user-centric social ecosystem.  It’s first decentralized application, JUSTALK, is an instant messaging and wallet app made for the crypto world, gaining over 100,000 registered users within 30 days of launch.  The app provides privacy protection for users through its point-to-point data transmission service.  Users have complete ownership and control over their own data, and need not worry about information leak of any kind.  Its digital currency, JUS, is one of the first mobile-enabled social currency for ordinary people.  Through chatting, transacting, browsing and gaming,  JUS is laying foundation for an inclusive, online ecosystem where everyday people can capture their fair share of digital wealth.
